required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Compare the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Mitapivat 100 mg Tablet Formulation With Mitapivat 2 × 50 mg Tablet Formulation in Healthy Adult Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label, Randomized, Two-Period, Crossover Study to Compare the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Mitapivat 100 mg Tablet Formulation With Mitapivat 2 × 50 mg Tablet Formulation in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to characterize and compare the pharmacokinetic profiles of mitapivat following a single dose administration of 100 mg mitapivat in two tablet formulations (50 mg and 100 mg tablet strengths) in healthy adult participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of Mitapivat From Time 0 to the Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC0-t)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: AUC of Mitapivat From Time 0 Extrapolated to Infinity (AUC0-inf)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Mitapivat
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax) of Mitapivat
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Terminal Elimination Rate Constant (λZ) of Mitapivat
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)
Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)
Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vd/F) of Mitapivat
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 120 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs)
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Values
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Findings for Vital Sign Parameters
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Findings for 12-lead Electrocardiogram (ECG) Parameters
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Physical Examination Findings

arm_group.description: Participants will receive Treatment A (mitapivat 100 milligram [mg] tablet formulation, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 1), followed by Treatment B (mitapivat 2 x 50 mg tablet formulation, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 2). Each treatment period will be separated by a washout period of at least 7 days.

Participants will receive Treatment B (mitapivat 2 x 50 mg tablet formulation, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 1), followed by Treatment A (mitapivat 100 mg tablet formulation, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 2). Each treatment period will be separated by a washout period of at least 7 days.
